meanings.sent1: She pluralised the nouns in her sentence.
meanings.sent2: The teacher always pluralised the words on the board.
meanings.sent3: The chef pluralised the recipe by adding more ingredients.
meanings.sent4: His actions pluralised the impact of the project.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brushstrokes pluralised the colors on the canvas.

meanings.sent3: The garden was pluralised with various flowers and plants.
meanings.sent4: Her voice pluralised the harmony of the choir.
